content: Hi! Thanks for submitting a bid. Can you share examples of similar weddings you've filmed?
Absolutely! I’ll send over a few highlight reels later today.
We love your proposal. What would the delivery timeline look like?
I can deliver the final video within 7 days after filming.
The event is on Saturday. Will you need any special access or equipment?
Just standard stage access and a power outlet for audio recording.
Do you have experience working with music videos and creative direction?
Yes! I’ve directed several indie music videos and can help shape the concept.
We’re aiming for an emotional tone. Is that something you’re comfortable with?
Definitely—storytelling and emotion are my strengths.
